H0.text: who had the longest tenure as moderator on meet the press. John Dickerson

H1.text: who had the longest tenure as moderator on meet the press. David Gregory

H2.text: who had the longest tenure as moderator on meet the press. Chuck Todd

H3.text: who had the longest tenure as moderator on meet the press. Tim Russert

A4.text: Timothy John Russert ... appeared for more than 16 years as the longest-serving moderator of NBC's Meet the Press.

A5.text: Russert became host of the Sunday morning program Meet the Press in 1991, and was the longest-serving host of the program.
